text: Fletcher Kapito (born 19 October 1959) is a Malawian former boxer. Fletcher competed in the light middleweight event at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, where he was defeated in the first round by his Sudanese opponent, Augustino Marial. Fletcher was the Malawian flag carrier in the opening ceremony at the Games. By March 1986, Kapito had lost some weight and began boxing in the welterweight category. ==References== Category:Malawian male boxers Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic boxers of Malawi Category:Boxers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Malawi Category:Boxers at the 1986 Commonwealth Games Category:Light-middleweight boxers
